title: INTERPOL Dismantles Infamous ’16shop’ Phishing-as-a-Service Platform
description:
By Waqas

The cybercrime platform 16shop sold hacking tools and other malicious tools used to compromise more than 70,000 users in 43 countries.

title: Irish Police Data Breach Rattles Northern Ireland’s Security Landscape
description:
By Habiba Rashid
